A5.text: Raphael was one of the finest draftsmen in the history of Western art, and used drawings extensively to plan his compositions.

A6.text: Ten drawings and three paintings were in the Royal Collection.

A7.text: V&A London online feature on the Raphael Cartoons.

A8.text: He worked in the Umbrian workshop of Perugino, an excellent painter and a superb technician.
